nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.progra: Absolute path to the startup script file.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.encodi: Encoding of the startup script file. Currently it is not supported yet.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.preDeb: Compile and check errors before debugging.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.port.d: TCP port for Debug Adapter Protocol.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.cwd.de: Aobsolute path to the working directory for script debug execution.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.debugg: Absolute path to the Debugger Runtime exe (typically n2studio).
nidonehsp-env.debugger.properties.logDeb: Enable logging target Debugger Runtime execution.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.configurationSnip: A new configuration for debugging nidonehsp script.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.resolve.unsupport: nidonehsp-env does not support the current OS/platform for debugging and building.
nidonehsp-env.debugger.resolve.preDebugC: Pre-Debug compile check failed, please see problems view.
nidonehsp-env.command.helpview.title: nidonehsp-env: Open HelpView (Reference).
nidonehsp-env.command.previewActiveScrip: nidonehsp-env: Preview current active script file.
nidonehsp-env.command.compileCheckActive: nidonehsp-env: Compile and check error current active script file.
nidonehsp-env: Build current active script file.
nidonehsp-env.command.exportActiveScript: nidonehsp-env: Export current active script file as Executable binary.
nidonehsp-env.task.compileCheck.properti: Absolute path to the script file for compile check.
nidonehsp-env.task.build.properties.prog: Absolute path to the script file for build.
nidonehsp-env.task.export.properties.pro: Absolute path to the script file for export.
nidonehsp-env.task.preview.properties.pr: Absolute path to the script file for preview
nidonehsp-env.configuration.runtime.runt: Absolute path to the directory holds n2 runtime binaries.
Absolute path to the directory holds n2 runtime binaries.
nidonehsp-env.configuration.runtime.stud: Absolute path to the n2studio executable.
Absolute path to the n2studio executable.
nidonehsp-env.configuration.runtime.incl: Additional include paths. Each paths must be absolute path.
Additional include paths. Each paths must be absolute path.
nidonehsp-env.configuration.runtime.defi: Additional macros. The format of macro definition is like 'macroName' or 'macroName=macroContent'.
Additional macros. The format of macro definition is like 'macroName' or 'macroName=macroContent'.
nidonehsp-env.shared.cannotResolveRuntim: nidonehsp runtime root directory not found. Resolved path is ${resolvedPath}.
nidonehsp-env.shared.cannotResolveStudio: n2studio not found. Resolved path is ${resolvedPath}.
nidonehsp-env.helpview.loading.title: loading helpview data ...
nidonehsp-env.helpview.statusbar.copied-: copied ${wordName} sample code to the clipboard
